attributes.action: give all british cadet forces more funding for activities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: cadet forces need more gouvernment funding for activities, equipment etc

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "give all british cadet forces more funding for activities."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17180


Prime Minister's Office
